description: Garphill Games has announced an upcoming Kickstarter campaign launching November 19. The campaign will offer a new deck of standard playing cards featuring artwork by The Mico from Garphill’s Medieval Trilogy games, with each suit representing characters from a different trilogy. Two versions of the deck will be available, each with unique card back art...
title: Garphill Games Announces New Kickstarter Featuring Medieval Trilogy Playing Cards and Reprints

description: Polyhedral Earth Society has announced Goblin King’s Gambit, a new role-playing game book designed for Dungeon Crawl Classics and 5th Edition systems, which is now on BackerKit. This 100+ page, hardbound book offers players an entry into a goblin-themed setting with multipath adventures, new class options, and a unique card system intended to streamline gameplay....
title: Goblin King’s Gambit Brings Goblin Culture to Life in New TTRPG Book

description: New Jersey-based design studio Aether Objects has introduced Cathedral Dice, an RPG dice set inspired by gothic cathedral stained glass. These oversized, sharp-edged resin dice feature vibrant inner cores, crafted with a double-casting process that brings out the depth and mystery of cathedral architecture. Each die’s translucent outer layer creates a “Veil” effect, while hand-painted...
title: Cathedral Dice: Gothic-Inspired RPG Dice by Aether Objects

description: The new fantasy card game Soularis has launched on Kickstarter, attracting attention as a “Project We Love” from the platform’s editorial team. Set in a world shaped by an apocalyptic event known as the “First Spark,” the game places players in a realm rebuilt after the fall of the Old Gods, now controlled by the...
title: Soularis is on Kickstarter: Become a Rebel Hero in a World of Souls and Masters
